description: When using v1_1 client, floating_ips.list() returns an empty list, while v2 client returns the correct list of floating ips.
title: floating_ips.list() broken in v1.1 client

comments.content: When using v1_1 client, floating_ips.list() returns an empty list, while v2 client returns the correct list of floating ips.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nejc-saje
